participant_1.name: Willow
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and quirky, Willow is passionate about animal rights and enjoys a vibrant lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. the holidays make me depressed.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Max loves engaging with friends over games and is an adventurous beach lover.
participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
